item.description:
Clotilde, a member of West Hartford Groupe de french, has invited us to her place in Farmington to watch a French film. It is a comedy called "Les Bronzes font du ski". There will be some wine and cheese. Thank you, Clotilde for this kind offer! C'est tres gentille a toi.
If you would like to go, please contact the organizer using the contact organizer button from the group's home page. After your reply, you will be sent the address.
Merci!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: French film
